Title: Kicking Bishop Brennan Up The Arse
Plot: A lost bet with Dick Byrne means Ted has to kick Bishop Brennan up the arse. On cue, Len arrives with PA Father Jessup, the world's most sarcastic priest. Elaborate preparations, a camera, a skirting board, a set of watercolours and some psychological warfare on Ted's part ensure a successful outcome... or do they?
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Jim Norton, Ian Fitzgibbon, Paul Tylak, Sharon Devlin, Aislinn Sands, Tim Dry, Paul Wonderful
